description: Complex multimodal test with video + multiple images analysis

config.code:
print("Multimodal complex test initialization")
video_uri = state.get('video_input_uri', 's3://test-bucket/sample_video.mp4')
image_uris = state.get('image_input_uris', [
    's3://test-bucket/spec_sheet_1.jpg',
    's3://test-bucket/spec_sheet_2.jpg',
    's3://test-bucket/spec_sheet_3.jpg'
])
state['multimodal_inputs'] = {
    'video': video_uri,
    'images': image_uris,
    'analysis_modes': ['video_summary', 'spec_extraction', 'feature_comparison']
}
state['multimodal_results'] = []
state['image_uris'] = image_uris
print(f"Multimodal inputs: 1 video + {len(image_uris)} images")

config.prompt: 비디오를 분석하여 제품 데모의 주요 특징을 요약해주세요. 비디오: {multimodal_inputs[video]}

config.code:
video_result = state.get('video_analysis', '') or state.get('video_analysis_output', '')
image_results = state.get('image_batch_results', [])
state['multimodal_summary'] = {
    'video_features': video_result if isinstance(video_result, str) else video_result.get('features', []) if hasattr(video_result, 'get') else [],
    'spec_count': len(image_results),
    'analysis_complete': True
}
state['multimodal_results'].append(state['multimodal_summary'])
print(f"Multimodal analysis complete: Video + {len(image_results)} images processed")

summary = state.get('multimodal_summary', {})
if summary.get('analysis_complete') and state.get('multimodal_test_enabled'):
    spec_count = summary.get('spec_count', 0)
    state['TEST_RESULT'] = f"✅ SUCCESS: Multimodal 복합 분석 완료 (Video + {spec_count} Images)"
else:
    state['TEST_RESULT'] = '❌ FAILURE: Multimodal 분석 실패'
print(f"Multimodal test result: {state['TEST_RESULT']}")
